text: @narendramodi @KagutaMuseveni Sir in this issue of COVID-19 the cases are increasing day by day... So if the government of India take more measures for this... It would be great... And thankyou so much for the orders taken by govt to solve this problem ... We are with you ... And we will be staying at home
